summary:
I discovered how to create completely exterior dungeons: no more loading screens, avoid PC performance issues, create unique atmospheres inside of your exterior dungeons!
There are no secrets at all. I just used my creativity! If you'd like to learn more, download my tutorial!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=6][b][color=#FF0000]COMPLETELY EXTERIOR DUNGEONS[/color][/b][/size][/font]
[color=#C00000][font=Century Gothic][size=4]- Tutorial by DavideMitra -[/size][/font][/color]

This is a downladable version of my tutorial. You can also check it online:

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/995692-making-a-cave-with-no-load-screens-feasible/]Original version - Scroll down until you'll find my tutorial
[/url]
[url=http://skyrimmw.weebly.com/skyrim-modding/completely-exterior-dungeons-skyrim-modding-tutorial]Slightly edited version by Matthiaswagg - External link to his website
[/url]


[font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font] The Tutorial [/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]I discovered how to create completely exterior dungeons.
Annoying loading screens won't bother you anymore, and your levels will look more realistic because of the gameplay continuity.

With the help of this tutorial, you will be able to:
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] [u]a[/u] [/i][/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] Create a natural entrance ramp that will lead you to the dungeon interior.
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] [u]b[/u] [/i][/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] Get rid of terrible terrain holes that will appear when digging dungeon rooms/hallways.
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] [u]c[/u] [/i][/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] Create a completely custom entrance doorway that will connect the dungeon to the exterior landscape.
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] [u]d[/u] [/i][/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] Avoid possible PC performance issues.
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] [u]e[/u] [/i][/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] Get rid of sunlight problems inside of the dungeon.
[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] [u]f[/u] [/i][/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font] Learn to add some effects that will help you to emulate an interior-cell's atmosphere.[/size][/b][/font]



[font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans [/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ The tutorial will teach you how to build a completely exterior dungeon with an underground entrance. Unless you are going to create a dungeon that will develop inside of a border montain, you will be forced to build an underground dungeon.

[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font]In order to proceed, you must know the Creation Kit basis. You must also know how to use the Landscape Editor and how to place roombounds and their specific connecting portals.

[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font]File format: PDF[/size][/b][/font]

MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]THANKS TO [u]MATTHIASWAGG[/u], because, without his smart suggestion, you would be forced to accept my horrible and unrealistic PC performance solution: pushing two levers at the dungeon entrance. Thanks to him, because I didn't know nothing about portals and roombounds!

[/size][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]Here's a link to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4995004/?tb=about&pUp=1]his Nexus Profile
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods...users/4995004/?]
[/url]
And here's a link to [url=http://skyrimmw.weebly.com/]his Skyrim website[/url], which is filled with useful tutorials (an online version of this tutorial too) and other Skyrim contents such as reviews[/size][/b][/font]!

MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]Unless you have my explicit permission, you can't edit this tutorial and you can't upload this tutorial to other modding sites.

You can create new dungeons with my method, but you must credit me because I discovered how to successfully build completely exterior dungeons[/size][/b][/font].


[font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font] You might also be interested in... [/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][b][color=#FF0000][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊[/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/color][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font]My last - and, IMO, my best - uploaded mod: [/size][/b][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54162/?][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]House of the Redguard - by DavideMitra
[/size][/b][/font][/url][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]The first Redguard-oriented abode. Completely exterior house (no loading screens). Unique design. A lot of special features, like staged objects and shield/scimitar on back![/size][/b][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]◊ [/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font][/size][/b][/font]My Work in Progress, that is also my retirement mod:[/size][/b][/font][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1788130-house-of-the-redguard-ii-official-mod-topic/][b][size=4]House of the Redguard II[/size][/b]
[/url][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]The evolution of House of the Redguard: this time, it will be a big warlord-oriented manor located near the Hammerfell border. The project started as a classic player abode, but this is going to evolve into a little Redguard DLC[/size][/b][/font].
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]House of the Redguard II will include a lot of completely exterior dungeons and there won't be any loading screen at all![/size][/b][/font]
author: DavideMitra
